ygData.subject: Where does all that plat come from?
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings! My main character is a paladin of the 12th season. Both arms and armor need improvement, yet the costs of both are heavy. While running through EC,
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings! My main character is a paladin of the
12th season. Both arms and armor need improvement, yet
the costs of both are heavy. While running through
EC, I hear prices in the thousands, but I have barely
a hundred plat after all this time. Where do people
get all that plat? Are there places I should be going
that I haven't been? Any advice would be much
appreciated. Fair Journeys!<br>(Written on behalf of Naeani,
Paladin of the 12th season, The Rathe [Death to Gix!])
